resources.string: This channel is to indicate whether the foreground service is running or not.

Host service is activated. Press Pause or Destruct to update its status.\n If You destruct the host, it will NOT reactivate its status until you activate it again manually.\n If You pause the host, it will reactivate its status based on your configuration.

Host service is not alive Press the Activate or Resume button to start.\n If you have never activated the Host service or the host service has been destroyed by you manually, you need activate it first.\n If you have deactivated the Host service, you could activate it or destruct it. After its destruction, everything will be reset.
Oh, no, our host is killing us. But no worry, let us keep fingers crossed that ourhost will resurrect on device reboot.
Let\'s do something awesome without worrying about being killed brutally by Android System.
